scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT  [E2eis_Seq_Number]
      ,[IMS_Transaction_Id]
      ,[Submitter_Id]
      ,[Submitter_First_Name]
      ,[Submitter_Last_Name]
      ,[Florida_Blue_Response]
      ,[Date_Time_Submitted]
      ,[Agent_Id]
      ,[Agent_First_Name]
      ,[Agent_Last_Name]
      ,[Runner_Name]
      ,[Upline_First_Name]
      ,[Upline_Last_Name]
      ,[Department_Name]
      ,[Department_Designation]
      ,[Client_First_Name]
      ,[Client_Last_Name]
      ,cast([Client_DOB] as date)as Client_DOB
      ,[Client_Phone]
      ,[Client_Email]
      ,[Client_Address_1]
      ,[Client_Address_2]
      ,[Client_City]
      ,[Client_State]
      ,[Client_Zip]
      ,[Member_Count_Enrolled]
      ,[Assigned_Id]
      ,[Status]
      ,[App_Submitted_Date]
      ,cast([Policy_Effective_Date] as date)as Policy_Effective_Date
      ,[Agent_Login_Used]
      ,[Carrier]
      ,[FFM_Id]
      ,[Subscriber_Id]
      ,[Client_Sex]
      ,[Married]
      ,[Pregnant]
      ,[Smoker]
      ,[American_Native]
      ,[Client_Income]
      ,[Client_Income_Freq]
      ,[Tax_Credit_Amount]
      ,[Plan_Premium]
      ,[Payment_Amount]
      ,[Plan_Name]
      ,[Plan_ID]
      ,[Insurance_Company]
      ,[Plan_Selected]
      ,[DateTime_Assigned]
      ,[Last_Status_Change] 
 ,[Agency_ID]
      ,[Record_Load_Date]
      ,[Record_Loaded_By]
      ,[Record_Data_Source]
      ,[Record_Flag_Status]   
  FROM [dbo].[AIA_IMS_POLICY_HISTORY] where Date_Time_Submitted >= '02-01-2024'
',
